summary: The life and career of the brutal Soviet dictator, Joseph Stalin.
cast: Robert Duvall|Julia Ormond|Maximilian Schell|Jeroen Krabbé|Joan Plowright|Frank Finlay|Roshan Seth|Daniel Massey|András Bálint|John Bowe|Jim Carter|Murray Ewan|Stella Gonet|Ravil Isyanov|Colin Jeavons|Miriam Margolyes|Kevin McNally|Clive Merrison|Lisa Orgolini|Joanna Roth|Emil Wolk|Levani|Mátyás Usztics|Oleg Tabakov|Aleksandr Feklistov|Vladimir Goryushin|Olga Anokhina|Gulya Isyanov|Dóra Dezséri|Robert Szilvasi|Adam Kahn|Natalya Kislitsina|Tatyana Kuznetsova|Vsevolod Larionov|Evgeniy Lazarev|Nikolay Lazarev|Anatoli Mashinov|Grigori Firsov|Aleksandr Orlov|Irina Lazareva|Lev Prygunov|Gene Ruby|Yelena Seropova|Stanislav Strelkov|Yuriy Vorobyov|Vadim Zavyalov|Mikhail Kalinkin|Zoltán Rátóti|György Gáti|Svetlana Tsoy|Adolf Hitler
title: Stalin
